markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Uncanny Awareness](/Feats.aspx?ID=2524) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a keen sense of movement around you. You gain motion sense as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet. Motion sense allows you to detect nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
name: Uncanny Awareness
